targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  COUNT(*) AS total,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN availability = 1 THEN 1 END) AS available,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN ocr_key IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END) as with_key,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN ocr_key IS NOT NULL AND availability = 1 THEN 1 END) as available_with_key
FROM
  MadelineProto.proxies;

SELECT
  COUNT(*) AS total,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN timeout IS NULL THEN 1 END) AS without_timeout,
  MIN(timeout) AS oldest_timeout
FROM
  MadelineProto.ocr_keys;
